title: Istanbul New Year's attack
text:
Next Istanbul New Year's attack 
An assailant believed to have been dressed in a Santa Claus costume opened fire at a nightclub in Istanbul during New Year’s celebrations Saturday, killing at least 35 people and wounding 40 others in what the city’s governor described as a terror attack. Gov. Vasip Sahin said the attacker, armed with a long-barreled weapon, killed a policeman and a civilian outside the club before entering and firing on people partying inside. He did not say who may have carried out what he called a “terror attack.” 
“Forty people are receiving treatment in hospitals,” Sahin said. 
People here are seen fleeing the Reina nightclub. Credit: Akin Celiktas/Dogan News Agency via REUTERS People flee the Reina nightclub 
People flee from a nightclub where a gun attack took place during a New Year party in Istanbul, Turkey, January 1, 2017. Credit: Akin Celiktas/Dogan News Agency via REUTERS Leaving the Reina 
Young people leave from the scene of an attack in Istanbul, early Sunday, Jan. 1, 2017. Credit: AP Photo/Halit Onur Sandal Injuries at Reina nightclub 
An injured woman is carried to an ambulance from a nightclub where a gun attack took place during a New Year party in Istanbul, Turkey, January 1, 2017. Credit: Murat Ergin/Ihlas News Agency via REUTERS Istanbul New Year's attack 
People run away from a nightclub where a gun attack took place during a New Year party in Istanbul, Turkey, on January 1, 2017. Credit: Ismail Coskun/Ihlas News Agency via REUTERS Near Reina nightclub 
Youths embrace near the scene of an attack in Istanbul, on New Year’s Day, early Sunday, Jan. 1, 2017. Credit: Depo Photos via AP Police secure an area near the Reina nightclub 
Police secure an area near the Reina nightclub. Credit: REUTERS Istanbul gun attack 
Police secure an area near an Istanbul nightclub, following a gun attack, Turkey, on January 1, 2017. Credit: REUTERS/Osman Orsal Istanbul road blocks 
An armoured police vehicle blocks a road leads to a nightclub where a gun attack took place during a New Year party in Istanbul, Turkey, January 1, 2017. Credit: Ismail Coskun/Ihlas News Agency via REUTERS Police secure area near an Istanbul nightclub 
Police secure area near an Istanbul nightclub, Turkey, January 1, 2017. Credit: REUTERS/Osman Orsal 
A police boat patrols the Bosphourus. Credit: REUTERS/Osman Orsal
